Notify.title: Email Notifications
Notify.confirmDeleteMailbox: Are you sure you want to delete {email}?

confirmDialog.title: Delete Mailbox
confirmDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the mailbox for {email}? This action cannot be undone.

emailRulesHeader.title: Email Notification Rules
emailRulesHeader.rule1: We will monitor and notify you of every transaction sent from the timelock contract;
emailRulesHeader.rule2Before: Please note that emails will be sent from
emailRulesHeader.rule2After: . If you don't receive emails, please check your spam folder and add the email to your whitelist;
emailRulesHeader.rule3: Configure your email notifications promptly to avoid missing important information.

addMailboxCard.addMailboxDescription: Add your email address to receive timelock notifications.
addMailboxCard.addMailboxButtonDescription: Add mailbox address and send verification code.
addMailboxCard.editMailboxDescription: Edit your email address and remark.

listeningPermissions.title: Listening Permissions
listeningPermissions.noTimelocks: No timelock contracts available. Please add some timelock contracts first.

addMailbox.title: Add Email
addMailbox.description: Enter your email address to receive timelock notifications.
addMailbox.emailAndRemarkRequired: Email address and remark are required
addMailbox.hasSend: Verification code has been sent, please check your email
